beer.beer_description:
Aldaris Porteris is a special and traditional variety of strong beer with a wonderful caramel taste and a light wine flavour which is also discernible in its aroma.

In 2007 Aldaris achieved a great result at the annual Australian International Beer Awards where in a competition featuring around 940 beers, Aldaris Porteris won a silver medal.

In late 2009, Porteris was awarded a top prize in one of the largest worldwide beer contests, the ‚ÄûEuropean Beer Star Award 2009‚Äù, receiving the silver medal. Since 2010 Porteris comes in a new packaging design, which is in line with the Aldaris product range.

items.badge_description: Traveling the world is hard, but not for you. It's as easy as cracking open a new brew! You have had a beer from at least 85 different regions around the world. Try 5 more for Level 18!

items.badge_description: Dating back to the 18th century, porters remain an extremely popular style to this day. That is 140 different beers with the style of Porter. Try 5 more Level 29!

Did you know that Latvia's landscape is marked with large beaches and dense forest? Neither did we, because we are here for the beer! That's 25 different beers from a brewery from Latvia. Try 5 more for Level 6!

items.badge_description: Celebrate women and non-binary folx in craft beer! Every year the Pink Boots Society (PBS) hosts Collaboration Brew Day where teams come together to brew a collab beer that supports the PBS mission to support, inspire, and encourage the professional development of women and non-binary people in the industry. Learn more

Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!

items.badge_description: There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 220 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 45!

Porters and Stouts are rich with both history and flavor. Roasty, dark, and delicious, these two styles helped start it all. That‚Äôs 230 different beers with the style of Porter or Stout. Try 5 more for Level 47!
